abstract: Lars Thunell, a director since 2012, will step down at the end of January and David Philbrick Conner will join as a director at the beginning of the year, the bank said.
snippet: Lars Thunell, a director since 2012, will step down at the end of January and David Philbrick Conner will join as a director at the beginning of the year, the bank said.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Standard Chartered said on Monday that it would make additional changes to its board of directors, with another director following several others out the door by the end of January.

headline.main: Standard Chartered Announces Additional Changes to Board

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
